overview: Mr. Phil Fan is our President. Mr. Fan was one of the founders of our company in 2003. Prior to founding our company, Mr. Fan provided technical, engineering and management services in several U.S. engineering firms, including Black and Veatch, Parsons Brinckerhoff, Inc. and Chastain-Skillman, Inc. From 2003 through 2005, Mr. Fan was the Asia Regional Sales Manager for Met-Pro Corporation. Mr. Fan earned his bachelorâ€™s and masterâ€™s degrees in environmental engineering from Hunan University and a masterâ€™s degree in civil engineering from Louisiana State University. Mr. Fan has been a registered professional engineer in the United States since 2001.
